item.title: Aspose.Diagram for Python via Java 24.2 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Diagram for Python via Java 24.2. Improvements and Changes Key Summary Category DIAGRAMJAVA-51177 Text layouting issue when converting VSDX to Svg Bug DIAGRAMJAVA-51178 Lost gradient fill when converting VSDX to Svg Bug DIAGRAMJAVA-51179 Icons on the top left and right are incorrect Bug Public API and Backwards Incompatible Changes The following is a list of any changes made to the public API such as added, renamed, removed or deprecated members as well as any non-backward compatible change made to Aspose.

item.title: Aspose.Diagram for Python via Java 24.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Diagram for Python via Java 24.1. Improvements and Changes Key Summary Category DIAGRAMJAVA-51170 Load diagram with Font only Bug DIAGRAMJAVA-51171 When converting vsd to vsdx throw cannot convert image type to string error Bug DIAGRAMJAVA-51172 Saving visio as png lost the right half Bug Public API and Backwards Incompatible Changes The following is a list of any changes made to the public API such as added, renamed, removed or deprecated members as well as any non-backward compatible change made to Aspose.
